data.name: H1Z1: Just Survive - FREE Alpaca Backpack
data.detailed_description:
Capable. Reliable. Fashionable. Better than the rest. Alpaca's survival packs, or Alpaca's survivors? Both. Alpaca backpacks make great gifts for those loyal friends you can't live without.

The Alpaca Cosmetic pack contains 1 cosmetic skin that can be applied to your character’s in-game appearance in H1Z1: Just Survive. Check out the other Just Survive Cosmetic packs and look for more personalization items found in crates in Just Survive. The H1Z1: Just Survive base game and a free Daybreak Account is required to purchase this pack.

data.short_description: Capable.  Reliable.  Fashionable.  Better than the rest.  Alpaca's survival packs, or Alpaca's survivors?  Both.  Alpaca backpacks make great gifts for those loyal friends you can't live without.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 Dual-Core with Hyper-Threading (required)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 275 series or higher / AMD Radeon HD 4870 X2 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 960 series or higher / AMD Radeon R9 280X series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
